name: IoESec ORG
body:
### Welcome to the Internet of Everything Security Project

#IoE

An integral security model is necessary for securing each element of the Internet of Everything

This project aims to be a place for discussion, proposals, resources sharing, in order to preserve people's right to privacy in this surveillance era

```
$ The 3 Powers
```
